Description:
Detects execution of "tar.exe" in order to extract compressed file.
Adversaries may abuse various utilities in order to decompress data to avoid detection.


Author: AdmU3
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Compressed File Extraction Via Tar.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\tar.exe' and original_file_name = 'bsdtar') and command like '%-x%')
